original_text: But the whole group was very surprised and afraid. They thought that they were seeing a spirit.
korean_text: 그들이 놀라고 무서워하여 그 보는 것을 영으로 생각하는지라

sentences.original_text: But the whole group was very surprised
They thought that they were seeing a spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신이 영을 보고 있다고 생각했다
